tab1.text1:
Hi, all Community has been a close-knit community of gamers since January 2016. 1 Owner 2 Admins to help you ingame and on discord. System ticket on discord.



          1. F1 to open this menu

          2.Shop & Kits in F2, for console players write /shop.

          3.F3 to report players.

        4.Link Donate if you want support Light's servers and win points

          5.Shift+F8 To find Wild or Tamed Dinos
tab1.text2:
● XP: x10, Harvest: x100, Taming: x20

          ● Breed x10, Gestation: x10, Egg Hatch: x10

          ● Player Level: 135

          ● Level Wild 200 - After Tame 300 - After LVL up 388

          ● Keep all your Stuff on Death with (Death Inventory Keeper)

tab2.text1:
1. Do not undermesh, glitch, exploit, insults, racism, abuse or cheat

          2. You are not allowed to spam foundations to excess. (This applies to all structures)

tab3.text1:
This section is for console players, you have all codes to buy kits.
     Command : /buy 'ID' 'Number', example : /buy 20 1   you buy an Ultimate TekPlot.
tab3.text2:
● 00 Kit Farming
          ● 01 Kit Seed Tier1.
          ● 02 Kit Seed Tier2.

tab4.text1:
By default, you start with 0 points and you have 30 points every 20 minutes.

     Vip Stone    : 05 euros  1000 points for 2 weeks. VIP on discord. Icon Vip ingame.

     Vip Bronze   : 10 euros  3000 points for 1 month. VIP on discord. Icon Vip ingame.

     Vip Silver   : 20 euros  8000 points for 1 month. VIP on discord. Icon Vip ingame.

     Vip Gold     : 30 euros 12000 points for 1 month. VIP on discord. Icon Vip ingame.

     Vip Platinum : 50 euros 25000 points for 2 month. VIP on discord. Icon Vip ingame.

     Vip God     : 100 euros 50000 points for 3 month. VIP on discord. Icon Vip ingame. Works on all light ASA servers.



     After a purchase do a ticket on discord to get your VIP pack.

     All donations allow to keep the server alive and to buy new plugins.
